mapper.select: select C.customer_id as id, C.customer_password as password, C.customer_type as type, C.customer_name as name, C.customer_birthday as birthday, C.customer_zipcode as zipcode, C.customer_basic_address as basicAddress, C.customer_detail_address as detailAddress, C.customer_phone as phone, C.customer_email as email, C.customer_deleted as deleted, C.customer_created_date as createdDate, C.customer_updated_date as updatedDate from customers C where C.customer_id = #{value}
